texts.DisplayName:PolpAbp.Framework.Account.Is: Is the use of user name enabled?
texts.Description:PolpAbp.Framework.Account.Is: Decides if a member can use his/her user name to login or not (Email is still ok).
Decides if a user can register to be a member
texts.Description:PolpAbp.Framework.Account.Re: Decides how a user becomes an active member of your organization.
texts.Description:PolpAbp.Framework.Account.Is: Decides if the admins will be notified of the new registrations or not.
texts.Description:PolpAbp.Framework.Account.Ss: Decides if your member can log into your organization with some SSOs.
Decides if the system will remind your remembers of using SSOs if they are not.
Decides if your member can log into your organization with some SSOs.
texts.DisplayName:PolpAbp.Framework.Security.U: Is the Recaptcha on registration disabled
texts.Description:PolpAbp.Framework.Security.U: Decides if the Recaptcha is disabled when a user registers for your organization.
texts.DisplayName:PolpAbp.Framework.Security.U: Is the Recaptcha on login disabled
texts.Description:PolpAbp.Framework.Security.U: Decides if the Recaptcha is disabled when a user logs into your organization.
texts.Description:PolpAbp.Framework.Security.T: Decides if the use of two factor code is required on login?
Decides if the system will remind the members of using two factor codes if they are not?
